title: Transfer Centre Extra: Behind the scenes at Sky Sports News
description: Watch Transfer Centre Extra - go behind the scenes at Sky Sports News as we bring you the dramatic story of the transfer week.
content: Transfer Centre Extra takes you beyond the story and behind the cameras as we look back on a dramatic week in the transfer market.Alexis Sanchez's proposed move from Arsenal to Manchester United dominated the last few days, and Transfer Centre Extra was at the heart of it all.We get more analysis from our team of reporters, including James Cooper and Ben Ransom in Manchester, who give us the inside track on why United are doing the deal and why City pulled out.There's behind-the-scenes access at Sky Sports News as we find out how our reporting makes it onto screen. We hear from Bryan Swanson, Kaveh Solhekol and Pete Graves, part of our podcast 'Transfer Talk'.We are also at Arsenal to find out whether Arsene Wenger will spend big before deadline day.Click on the video above to watch behind the scenes footage at Sky Sports News!
